rules.name: header_structure
rules.description: All markdown files must have a level 1 header (#) at the top

rules.name: code_blocks
rules.description: Code blocks must specify language for syntax highlighting

rules.name: link_format
rules.description: Links must use reference-style format for better readability

rules.name: list_format
rules.description: Lists must use consistent indentation and bullet points

rules.name: table_format
rules.description: Tables must have header row and alignment specified

rules.name: image_alt
rules.description: All images must have alt text for accessibility

rules.name: heading_hierarchy
rules.description: Headings must follow proper hierarchy (no skipping levels)

rules.name: list_spacing
rules.description: Lists must have blank lines before and after
